QuestData.Title: Exarch Maladaar
QuestData.Description: The council is almost assembled: Othaar, myself, Hataaru and Naielle are ready. Only Exarch Maladaar remains. He has not been himself since he returned from his capture at the hands of the Iron Horde... but Vindicator Maraad was able to track him down.$b$bFind Maladaar at the Fey Landing, just south of the town center.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Exarch Maladaar at the Fey Landing south of Elodor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Exarch Maladaar at the Fey Landing south of Elodor in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, my Alliance friend from Tanaan! I have not forgotten my debt to you.$b$bI will do everything in my power to convince the council to support you in every way possible. However...$b$b<The Exarch lowers his voice.>$b$bI have grave concerns about our safety here.
